name: gorlit
description: they like to race other down the volcanos by rolling. their skin on their backs is as hard as stone. they are playful but can be very territorial.

name: gorox
description: goroxs are known for their eagerness to challenge others on the top of volcanos to spar. they like to eat molten rocks to fuel their strenght.

name: gorcano
description: covering themselves with a volcano, they are known as the guardians of the mountain. they are able to erupt.

name: zorelle
description: they are extremely positive and always want to show off to their swimming prowess to their trainer. despite their love for swimming, they hate cold water.

name: spydull
description: spydulls are often misunderstood. they use a skull for protection but often times scare off potential friends away.

name: spookoon
description: spookoons are very fright-end revomon. they snuggle into their skull shell and wrap themselves in a blanket-like web to be protected from predators.

name: skultergeist
description: skultergeists are possessed revomon. the ghost of the skull they inhabited takes control and forces them to torment others.

name: chikito
description: chikitos struggle to take flight despite their efforts. they use cliffs, hills and updrafts to glide accross the revomon landscape.

name: falcolt
description: falcolts generate an electrical current through their tail. this allows them to fly at high speeds. they are known to start fires when they fly too close to foliage.

name: pincub
description: they travel through the woodlands often unseen by using their camouflage. when they gather, they look like bushes from the distance.

name: camprikine
description: they're perfectly adapted to the life in the forest blending perfectly with the pine trees. their needles despite looking fragile they are though as stone.

name: swiftling
description: swiftlings are often seen doing acrobatics in the sky. the flocks form arrow-shaped patterns and fly at high speeds for long distances.

name: veloswift
description: they are amongst the fastest flyers, reaching speeds that break the barrier of sound. the gusts of wind that come from their wings are razor-sharp when attacking.

name: fungas
description: their foul fumes can be smelled from several feet away. they're usually loners as their smell keeps everyone away.

name: smogshroom
description: they protect themselves by releasing dense curtains of poisonous smoke as shield. inhaling their fumes can cause hallucinations.

name: echomaus
description: they use electromagnetic waves to analyze their surroundings.it is believed that all echomaus can comunicate with each other from thousands of miles away.

name: radarent
description: they are well known as the best detectives as their senses are unmatched. they can detect and locate any creature or object by sending electric pulses from their tails.

name: dosoil
description: unknowingly stepping on a dosoil's piece of land will make them angry, their revolts might cause small tremors underground.

name: comboworm
description: in order to travel between places, comboworms have to focus their brains and bodies and move in unison. sometimes their slab of soil can be larger than a house.

name: navixy
description: navixies are known to aid trainers in and out of combat. some find their cries annoying, but they always have good intentions.

name: farinade
description: farinades like to lure humans to the waters of the springs they reside in. they are known for giving away blessings to those who trust them.

name: lycub
description: lycub are known for charging at anything they cross. its short temper causes trouble with other revomon. humans look past its attitude for its fluff.

name: champlion
description: these revomon have no problem challenging others to battle to prove their dominance. their punches can shatter stone.

name: vyphern
description: it can stop its opponents' movements with just a glare. it takes in solar energy and boosts it internally.

name: sumbear
description: this little creature amazes researchers with its cheerfulness. however, it can quickly become cumbersome as it evolves.

name: grizleaf
description: in its territory, it leaves scratches on trees that bear delicious berries or fruits.

name: wintursa
description: it's believed that this revomon modeled its fighting style on an iceberg. sometimes rapid, sometimes calm.

name: blazlet
description: they slither through the cracks of volcanos absorbing their warmeth. their tail expels smoke that they can use disorient their enemies.

name: coalbra
description: coalbra stores a considerable amount of energy in his body. it can influence the climate around it by discharging the energy contained in the coals of its neck and tail.

name: volcanolisk
description: when at an all-out move, its blazing mane sparkles, enhancing its terrifying appearance.

name: pupple
description: pupples are able to travel on land bouncing on their bubble. they can create these bubbles by sucking air through their gills and blowing it out of the tip of their tail through a soapy gland.

name: sharku
description: sharkus are a lot more vicious than their pre-evolution from litter and trash in waters around the world constantly popping their bubbles.

name: tidju
description: tidju’s have molded their hatred towards the polluants of the world into energy that is empowered by the ocean.

name: raival
description: this revomon flies around, patrolling its large territory. if its living space is violated, it punishes the foe its sharp claws.

name: dominevo
description: dominevos can send their orb into objects to bring them to life and control them. they are able to start and stop almost anything.

name: twilevo
description: twilevos roam the world at dusk.they are very mysterious as they have never been seen at any other time.

name: venturevo
description: venturevos journey throughout the world exploring and searching for hidden artifacts. they are an amazing companion when looking for secret locations.

name: loftevo
description: loftevos can fly at very high speeds. they don't have wings but lightweight and feather like fur allow the to lift off the ground.

name: drakevo
description: drakevos are known to roam throughout the world searching for orbs. they are made up of ancient dragon parts that fuel their strength.

name: hauntevo
description: hauntevos like to lurk around graves and lure unsuspecting foes towards their lantern. the lantern is rumoured to have the souls trapped inside.

name: r3v-up
description: years of research has led to the development of r3v-up, the worlds first man-made revomon connected to the blockchain. designed and programmed to be the perfect companion to any aspiring revomon tamer.
spawn_table:
Must Buy From Revomon.Io Marketplace

1%

name: tipply
description: this fluffy fish with its cute and harmless appearance you would like to hug. although it is not yet blown and has only a few spikes, this little friend can already throw several jet bubble blasts.

name: hassurugu
description: halfway through his inflated state, hassurugu becomes increasingly angry and dangerous. he can now emit flames and steam from his upper spikes.

name: masakaridon
description: the spiky underwater scorpion. skin like a rock and the ability to turn its dorsal fins into bladed weapons make masakaridon a real sea beast.

name: dexuno
description: found only in the most techically advanced cities, dexuno will spend its time exploring to find itself new parts to incorporate into its body

name: dexdeux
description: after self-upgrading, dexdeux is now way more advanced and durable. using its two ai brains it can virtually twist physical forces around.

name: dexdrei
description: the power of its ai core is immesurable. its body is composed of several dexuno and dexdeux that combined are now an unstopable force.

name: dexfyre
description: there has been studies that only a limited number of dexfyre are currently in existence. they must not come in contact with each other for too long or the energy of their cores would become unstable enough to cause timespace warping.

name: dregg
description: it's shell is almost indestructible from the outside, allowing for great protection while the revomon inside finds the courage to brave the outside world.

name: wyvegg
description: although wyvegg is very friendly around other revomon, it is usually very wary around humans and wont hesitate to hide inside its impenetrable egg.

name: craggon
description: each craggon keeps some of its former shell on its body as a reminder to itself how strong it has become without it.

name: skwitzen
description: skwitzen like to gather berries and nuts found in the wilderness and hide them in locations where there is a lot of static electricity.

name: skwimera
description: skwimera makes great use of both of its heads, one is used fo focus on its task, while the other keeps a look out for anyone after it's stash.

name: skwerberos
description: as it is so good at protecting its own horde, skwerberos are starting to be used by humans as guards for their own valuables.

name: monking
description: while it usually rules over its territory from way above the clouds, it has been known to descend to the ground to assist any of its revomon subjects in need of assistance.

name: koigup
description: koigups are most commonly found in the shallow areas of large lakes, their friendly nature makes them popular with children

name: koigar
description: koigar are very territorial and will emit a small waterproof flame to alert tresspassers they have come too close

name: slisces
description: when enraged, slisces will recklessly thrash about, slicing away until it tires itself out

name: somnap
description: a somnap can sleep for up to 23 hours a day, it is said to pass on good dreams to those that sleep nearby.

name: soarnap
description: in local folklore, a swarm of soarnaps will visit children who suffer from nightmares and sing a lullaby to soothe them into a more peaceful sleep.

name: soarnox
description: when angered or threatened, a soarnox will not hesitate to curse its aggressor with a month of terrifying nightmares

name: spectreat
description: although they are mostly active in the autumn months, spectreats can sometimes be found pulling pranks on unaware people all year round.

name: mummole
description: mummoles will usually appear to travellers lost in caves to help them find their way out.

name: hookanga
description: from the day it hatches, it looks for another hookanga to make its rival, challenging it to daily boxing fights.

name: roojab
description: very few people have been punched by a roojab and have survived to tell the tale. they can punch even faster than the human eye can comprehend.

name: kangkross
description: a kangkross is incredibly protective of the hookanga it keeps in its pouch, using teamwork they are able to overcome almost any foe.

name: wolpan
description: they live deep in the forests and are only active at night, when only their glowing red eyes can be seen.

name: turtislet
description: while turtislet is keen to explore the open ocean, its small frame means it cannot withstand much more than the most gentle of waves.

name: shellacay
description: shellacays are fantastic swimmers, they have been known to interrupt human surfing contests to show off their prowess.

name: atolloise
description: atolloise are usually nomadic creatures, roaming from continent to continent, ferrying smaller revomon on its back.

name: scorpyd
description: they wander through the dunes finding the best spot to sunbathe. their presence are thought to be a sign of imminent sandstorms.

name: tetrapion
description: they lure invaders with their glistening crystals to their underground traps. ancient cultures believed them to be a symbol of death.

name: bouldorable
description: they can usually be found near human mining sites, scavenging through rubble for the tastiest rocks to eat.

name: rockonid
description: a rockonid's tail is hard enough to be used to crush smaller rocks, yet light enough to be carried around with ease.

name: pandozer
description: pandozer's tail is made up from the rocks most common in its diet. collectors have attempted to feed them diets of only gemstones to try and produce tails of solid diamond.

name: frostoast
description: in the winter months it is very common to see a frostoast rolling down snowy hillsides. the heat from its body melts all the snow around it.

name: furnice
description: it has been said that a traveller stuck in a blizzard will likely be rescued by a furnice, who will keep them warm and dry until the blizzard subsides.

name: peafrost
description: they are constantly moving to avoid freezing in the tundras. they kick other peafrost as a way of training.

name: kickundra
description: the kicking abilites of this revomon are legendary and can leave opponents frozen solid. one kick from a kickundra can take down a big tree with ease.

name: bluezilla
description: when it is not running around chasing its own tail, it likes to pick up smaller revomon and launch them to greater heights than they have ever been before.

name: polluvern
description: when a polluvern takes flight during a heavy storm, the toxic fumes from it's wings usually cause the clouds to produce acid rain.

name: locuna
description: these calm revomon crave moonlight. they can leap really high and legends say they do this to try and reach the moon.

name: lunacoon
description: immobile during most of the day, they start moving slowly once the moon sets in order to absorb the moonlight they need to evolve.

name: moontis
description: during every full moon, swarms of moontis can be seen hopping on the treetops trying to catch as much moonlight as possible. no moontis has ever been spotted during a lunar eclipse.

name: bookwyrm
description: bookwyrms try to find the thickest and heaviest books they can find to use as armour. they are incredibly aggressive to anyone that opens a book with them inside.

name: leximinth
description: a leximinth will try to make itself a lair within a library, where it has free reign to move between hundreds of books whenever it wants.

name: teddream
description: they always carry an eerie creature on top of their heads who often influence their behaviour making decisions on its own, usually forcing teddream to obey.

description: the ghostly creature has now taken over teddream's will by constantly putting it in a trance where it maniupulates its dreams causing nightmares to control it.

name: reingifir
description: unlike most forest creatures, a reingifir actually hibernates during the summer and only wakes for the winter months

name: cupidove
description: they love to snuggle and will often preen their favorite people, revomon and their own trainer. they are known to sense the love and passion between individuals.

name: dovamour
description: getting pecked by a dovamour may cause strong infatuation with the next individual seen. their singing is often heard during wedding celebrations.

name: romanfrig
description: flocks of romanfrig gather during sunsets in order to find mates, once they find the one, they stay together for the rest of their lives.

name: wyverdant
description: there's legends about wyverdants being the guardians of every forest and jungle. their roar is said to make plants grow and flowers bloom.

name: odonymph
description: despite its tough appearence, they wander calmly near bodies of water, eating and storing energy they need for evolving.

name: drakefly
description: they move really fast projecting illussions of themselves to intimidate intruder revomon while rapidly attacking them from behind.

name: meganeudra
description: usually referred to as the 'terror of the forest', hearing their buzzing from the distance is motif of fear amongst other revomon who often choose to flee from meganeudras' path.

name: ninesee
description: born from the chaotic energy of a faraway world, this little mischevious creature has been known to hide within the hedgerows and jump out to surprise humans walking past to try and scare them, however it rarely succeeds due to its cute face.

name: bloomsee
description: bloomsees can usually be found protecting the fields and gardens of more rural human settlements. it is said that crops protected by a bloomsee will grow even quicker and taller.

name: gardsee
description: flowers cannot die in the presence of a gardsee, no matter how old they are. it has been said that even flowers presumed dead may still recover after a visit from a gardsee.

name: mirrate
description: a single glimpse to mirrate's mirror can reveal the true intentions, desires and identity of whoever is reflected.

name: miraflect
description: this mysterious revomon can reveal three different fates at once when staring at its mirrors; one for past, one for the present and one for the future.

name: soleel
description: they are solitary revomon who only seek for the company of other soleel, once they find the perfect match they’re ready for evolution.

name: doubeel
description: using both their brains combined to solve tasks make doubeel a tough adversary. although both heads tend to dissagree at times of distress.

name: triplydra
description: there’s legends of triplydras that had a hundred sentient heads and guarded the gates of a submarine utopia thousands of years ago.

name: floatiloch
description: despite their rareness, they’re comfortable around humans, often carrying children on their backs across ponds and lagoons.

name: raftnesse
description: usually raftnesses are timid revomon not seen often in the wild. although they’re know for helping people out of danger in deep waters.

name: fawneel
description: fawneel are known for their tough horns, they polish them by rubbing them against rocks and trees.

name: buckalloy
description: their antlers are immune to any corrosion and are strong enough to take down a large tree in one hit. the sturdy metallic compounds on their bodies are still subject of study.

name: caracell
description: they move and wander until their power cell runs out of electricity, they fell into a deep sleep in order to recharge

name: snattery
description: they generate electricity as they move and store it in their shells. sometimes they accidentally cause small discharges that make other revomon become paralyzed for a few minutes

name: eschargot
description: they store so much energy within their bodies that they can light up half a city for days without having to recharge. many electric revomon get attracted by eschargot strong magnetic fields

name: vachita
description: their horns are very heavy for their size so they usually move very slowly. vachitas carry a positive aura wherever they go.

name: hobeex
description: a hobeex will stay within its hive, using it as protective armor, allowing it to produce its own honey in peace, which it will slowly eat during the winters.

name: honikoba
description: a honikoba is formed when a hobeex has produced too much honey, causing it to burst free from its hive. the honey exposed to the air may be toxic to humans but it is delicious to some other revomon.

name: rokilo
description: they are found wandering in construction sites, although they aim to help, they usually end up causing trouble by mistake.

name: gravilon
description: gravions are skilled workers and can assemble and dismantle big constructions in little time. they usually add and change parts of their bodies in the process.

name: construkto
description: they are often used in demolition and large construction projects. contruktos can tear down any skyscraper within minutes.

name: yelloon
description: they practice their skills with other yelloons, using them as punching bags during the day and night.

name: roughoon
description: roughoons are tough and sturdy, they will restlessly train to become the best at throwing accurate punches.

name: azuroon
description: their combat abilities are unmatched. it's huge arms can send almost any foe flying away in a single toss.

name: kasket
description: they emit an enchanting rattling sound from inside their metallic casket, the sound is said to be torturous for those meanspirited, but healing for those of good will.

name: skadire
description: skadire is a fierce hunter, it uses the cover of a thick blizzard to catch its prey unaware. it has a strong malice towards anyone it catches mistreating other revomon.

name: khepreetle
description: not often seen by humans, khepreetle will watch over and protect the sands. it very rarely travels without the cover of a thick sandstorm.

name: murdoll
description: a wild murdoll will spend most of the year dormant, but once a year they spring to life and cause pranks on unsuspecting humans.
spawn_table:
Sakura Burgh (Halloween Event 2022)
20:00 to 3:58

name: holleader
description: during the warmer months, a holleader will hide away where it wont be disturbed, only to reappear for the winter months, its berries are said to have healing properties.
spawn_table:
Arktos Village (Xmas Event 2022)

name: kindling
description: kindling is known for its adorable appearance and warm-hearted nature. with its soft fur and expressive eyes, it captivates hearts effortlessly. this gentle companion brings comfort and solace to those around it, creating a sense of tranquility wherever it goes.

name: elvifir
description: this revomon is known for its mischievous antics, often playing pranks on unsuspecting trainers and leaving behind small, festive gifts.

name: twinkletree
description: twinkletree is said to be a guardian of joy, spreading goodwill and cheer wherever it goes.

name: sparknite
description: from the heart of electric storms, sparknite emerges as a tiny, pulsating bundle of energy. with an insatiable curiosity, this cutie sets out to explore, its electric spirit sparking connections wherever it roams.

name: immubolt
description: encased in crackling armor, immubolt stands as a guardian, its unwavering loyalty a shield for those it holds dear. its final form may surpise you.

name: immutable
description: immutable, in harmony with the immutable partnership, embodies the unbreakable bond of strength and endurance, a testament to the resilience of the electric spirit.
